Title: Relates to special day schools and the instruction of school delinquents
Summary: Provides that schools need not provide special instruction to delinquent students whose violent behavior poses an unreasonable risk to teachers and students in special day schools or special school rooms; permits shared services in connection with the establishment of such special schools.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to special day schools and the instruction of school delinquents
